subject: Discontinuation of issuance of circulars seeking details of ongoing consultancies & deterrent actions on consultants/ personnel - Reg.
text: HRd4 <ey TTTANf xifearut Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 Tqrt_ Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 (s7 YRaut & Tonf TAC4) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7-5 Q 6, dazr-10, ERqT, T foelt-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-1O, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAV/ Policy Guidelines/ Consultancies & Deterrent Actions 2019 No 10.2.19/2019 dated the 0S' August, 2019 [Decision taken in 395th EC meeting on agenda item no. 395.01 (v)] Sub:: Discontinuation of issuance of circulars seeking details of ongoing consultancies & deterrent actions o consultants/ personnel Reg: The Executive Committee in its 395th   meeting has   decided that all the Technical Divisions to stop issuing the circulars seeking thereby the details of ongoing consultancies & deterrent actions on the consultants/ personnel for evaluation of RFPs/ CVs of the consultants_ 2, In view of above, all the technical divisions are hereby advised to fill all the details of engagement in the post award module of INFRACON and to submit the details of deterrent action/ blacklisting, wherever the action is valid as on date, to the IT Division & INFRACON (NHIDCL) within 7 days. 3 _ Subsequently, CGM (IT) shall ensure that such details are updated on NHAI website in searchable/ sortable format, accordingly. 4 Thereafter , all the technical divisions   shall only refer the NHAI website/ INFRACON portal & the practice of issuing circulars seeking details of engagement of personnel and deterrent action on consultant/ personnel be discontinued. 5 These instructions should be followed strictly for all future cases, accordingly. 6_ This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. V.K Sharma) CGM (Coord & Parl;) Copy to: All Officers and employee of HQ/ROs/PIU/CMUs/ Site offices. (ii) Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi.
